idea:
VIRRTU Insights was founded in early 2021 with the aim to help companies, researchers and marketeers understand more about the changing behaviors, opinions and perceptions in the new normal. 


With more than 25 years of experience in evolving and refining techniques in consumer research, we are proud to continuously innovate and support our clients and partners to achieve more.


We can assist with offline and online research using some of the most sophisticated techniques.


VIRRTU is located in Mumbai with associates PAN India. We have international associates covering Bangladesh, and will soon be available in Indonesia and Vietnam.
name: Virrtu Insights LLP

name: TECHNO TOONZ PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: FateMate established in 2021, headquartered in Mumbai, India is a mobile application. The platform allows people to chat with each other without having to worry about what they have or how they look. The user can choose their mate preference in terms of age, gender and location and reveal their identity to the user of choice. Venting, brainstorming & talking improves the mental and physical health of an individual. FateMate is the first global application that endorses establishing immaterial connections.
name: FATEMATE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Startup & Standup aims to mobilise various women SHGs in Fisheries and Agri field for Production of Fish Leather. Women SHGs shall be employed on three key areas: Firstly collection of Fish Skin, Sorting and grading., Secondly, Transformation of Fish skin to leather and Finally, Preparing Stationary, handicrafts from the Fish skin leather.

The Firm shall then market these products , that shall create generate revenue. The product created from this process shall be unique, innovative and environmental friendly.
name: Startup & Standup
